content:
Hi everybody,
We are use SMILE CDR and it seems that searching using the _list parameter is not implemented yet. If I use [base]/Patient?_list=f1ce6447-820d-4176-bcea-62fb39daff44 I get a list of all patients instead of the patients in the list.
I like to make a subscription for all appointments where the actor "patient" is in the list. (I thought about a subscription criteria like "Appointment?patient:_list=f1ce6447-820d-4176-bcea-62fb39daff44")
Has anybody an idea how I can express this in another way?
Thanks for your ideas

Michael
Hi @Michael Sauer - Unfortunately not yet supported. You could definitely make a support request to get that support added though, we've been planningit for ages but it hasn't yet been prioritized.
